About the App

What is Number Position?

"Number Position" is a fun and interactive number guessing game where players take turns guessing each other's secret codes. The objective of the game is to guess a 4-digit secret code set by the opponent by making guesses and receiving feedback on how many digits are correct in terms of both number and position. Itâ€™s a game of strategy, logic, and a bit of luck!

Key Features

  • Real-time multiplayer gameplay.
  • Guess a 4-digit secret code and receive feedback on the number and position of digits.
  • Leaderboards to track wins, losses, and draws.
  • Simple yet challenging gameplay, suitable for all ages.

About the Creator

This web app was created by Adem, a passionate software developer with a love for creating fun and challenging games. Adem is dedicated to building interactive web applications that bring people together and create meaningful experiences. You can find more about him on his GitHub profile and personal website.

Feel free to check out other projects by Adem and explore his work in the world of tech.

); }; export default AboutPage;
